title: [SDMP 0.10.4](http://sdmp.github.io/) Journal Update Schema
description: Schema for an SDMP [journal update](http://sdmp.github.io/docs/synchronization/#journal-update) object. These are used by nodes to send journal updates to other nodes.

since.description: This property is the [journal line number](http://sdmp.github.io/docs/journal/#journal-line-number) of the line immediately preceding the first entry in the journal entries list of this object.
